definition: to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: Much attention must be paid in clinic to the cancerization trend of gastric disease with Spleen deficiency syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 临床上应高度重视脾虚气滞证胃病的癌变倾向。

sentences.english: SuckSmokeCan cause blaze of oral cavity mucous membrane, even canceration.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟能引起口腔粘膜白斑，甚至癌变。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the pathological diagnosis of enteroscope biopsy on large intestine adenoma canceration.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大肠腺瘤癌变肠镜活检的病理诊断。

sentences.english: Although mastitis the cancer probability is low, but actually cannot remove completely.
sentences.chinese: 乳腺炎虽然癌变的几率较低，但是却不能完全排除。

sentences.english: These cancerous cells then grow clonally into tumors and eventually have the potential to metastasize.
sentences.chinese: 这些癌变细胞克隆生长成肿瘤，并最终具有转移潜能。

sentences.english: Chronic leukemias have few or no blast cells.
sentences.chinese: 慢性白血病很少或根本没有癌变的母细胞。

sentences.english: Objective: To establish a sqUamous carcinoma model in the forestomach of face and observe the pcness of itstnallgnant changes.
sentences.chinese: 建立小鼠前胃鳞状细胞癌模型和观察其癌变过程。

sentences.english: When necessity makes cervix of the uterus TCT the inspection, may discharge the cervix of the uterus the early cancer.
sentences.chinese: 必要时做宫颈TCT的检查，可排出宫颈的早期癌变。

sentences.english: Methods 5 case of lip cancer based on DLE were reported.
sentences.chinese: 方法分析5例唇部DLE发生癌变的临床资料。

sentences.english: But cellphones do emit radiation. Doesn’t radiation cause cancer?
sentences.chinese: 但是手机确实有辐射，手机辐射会引起癌变吗？

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the three-dimensional structure of normal and cancerous female mammary duct and acinus system.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究女性正常及癌变乳腺导管系统的三维结构。

sentences.english: She must excise every scrap of cancerous tissue.
sentences.chinese: 她必须切除每一片癌变的组织。

definition: growth (of organism)/proliferation/supernumerary candidate (in imperial examation system)
